name: Agent Skills Marketplace
description: Community marketplace for Claude Code agent skills
author: alycd

skills.name: Draw.io Diagram Builder
skills.description: Create professional Draw.io (diagrams.net) XML diagrams for architecture, network flows, and system designs. Use when the user asks to create diagrams, architecture diagrams, flow charts, network diagrams, system diagrams, or mentions Draw.io/diagrams.net. Supports AWS/GCP icons, grouping, and custom styling.
skills.author: alycd

skills.name: Skill Writer
skills.description: Guide users through creating Agent Skills for Claude Code. Use when the user wants to create, write, author, or design a new Skill, or needs help with SKILL.md files, frontmatter, or skill structure.
skills.author: alycd

visualization.name: Visualization
visualization.description: Skills for creating diagrams, charts, and visual representations

development.name: Development
development.description: Skills for software development workflows and tooling
